title: Projects
text:
EntropyScaling.jl



JuliaLang

Thermodynamics

Transport Properties




Julia package for modeling transport properties based on entropy scaling enabling the physical modeling of the viscosity, thermal conductivity, and diffusion coefficients




Role: Maintainer









  





  Clapeyron.jl



JuliaLang

Thermodynamics




Extensive thermodynamic library written in the Julia language including thermodynamic property solvers and a large variety of different models




Role: Contributor
